name: Chest Picker - 4 Hour Game Jam
description:
Rules : 

You have to manage your food and keys by earning enough gold. 
You do this by trying to be as efficient as possible solving the chest puzzles.

You have to type numbers 0-9 with the keyboard to input numbers. Try to guess all the numbers in the least amount of tries. 

Submit your guesses by pressing the [>] button to the right.

Every 3 successful chests opened the game will get harder.

Source Code Itch.io version:

https://github.com/Darkfafi/4hGameJam-Survival-2022/releases/tag/1.1.0

Time Lapse video of Development:
